title: The Adventure of the Crooked Man
description: Holmes calls on Watson late one evening to tell him about a case that he has been working on, and also to invite him to be a witness to the final stage of the investigation. He wants Watson to accompany him to Aldershot which is about 50 kilometres south of London.A synopsis of the case? Colonel James Barclay, of The Royal Mallows based at Aldershot Camp, is dead by violence, and his wife Nancy is the prime suspect.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
